properties.areaDesc: Pope, IL; McCracken, KY; Massac, IL; Livingston, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 11:30AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Paducah, Kentucky has issued a
flood warning for the following rivers in Illinois...Kentucky...

Ohio River at Paducah

...Forecast Flooding Changed from Minor to Moderate Severity for the
following rivers in Illinois...Kentucky...Missouri...

Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and at Cairo

.Current and forecast heavy rainfall expected across the Ohio River Basin
today through Saturday night will cause water levels to rise to at least
Minor flood stage at Paducah.  This rainfall is also expected to move
flood levels from minor to moderate flood stage at Olmsted Lock and Dam
and Cairo Illinois.

The National Weather Service in Paducah, Kentucky has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Ohio River at Paducah.
* from Monday afternoon until further notice.
* At 11:00 AM Friday the stage was 37.4 feet.
* Flood Stage is 39.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by early Monday afternoon and
continue to rise to near 41.5 feet by early Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 43.0 Feet...Moderate flooding occurs affecting several
small unprotected towns.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
